name: The Mountaineers Books Rock Climbing, 2nd Edition
description: Looking to move beyond the climbing gym, or just get started with climbing? This bestselling guide features valuable instruction, with up-to-date technological standards and techniques. Concise writing and clear photography simplify the complex yet rewarding sport of rock climbing. Featuring sections on technique, equipment and safety, this is an essential resource for climbers looking to safely explore all aspects of the sport.
